@@ -1,1307 +0,0 @@
-class Watch:%0A    def __init__(self, hour: int, minutes: int, seconds: int) -%3E None:%0A        self.setHour(hour)%0A        self.setMinutes(minutes)%0A        self.setSeconds(seconds)%0A%0A    def __str__(self) -%3E str:%0A        return f%22%7Bself.__hour:02d%7D:%7Bself.__minutes:02d%7D:%7Bself.__seconds:02d%7D%22%0A%0A    def getHour(self) -%3E int:%0A        return self.__hour%0A%0A    def getMinutes(self) -%3E int:%0A        return self.__minutes%0A%0A    def getSeconds(self) -%3E int:%0A        return self.__seconds%0A%0A    def setHour(self, value: int) -%3E None:%0A        if value not in range(0, 24):%0A            print(%22fail: hora invalida%22)%0A        else:%0A            self.__hour = value%0A%0A    def setMinutes(self, value: int) -%3E None:%0A        if value not in range(0, 60):%0A            print(%22fail: minuto invalido%22)%0A        else:%0A            self.__minutes = value%0A%0A    def setSeconds(self, value: int) -%3E None:%0A        if value not in range(0, 60):%0A            print(%22fail: segundo invalido%22)%0A        else:%0A            self.__seconds = value%0A%0A    def nextSecond(self) -%3E None:%0A        self.__second += 1%0A        if self.__second == 60:%0A            self.__second = 0%0A            self.__minutes += 1%0A        elif self.__minutes == 60:%0A            self.__minutes = 0%0A            self.__hour += 1%0A        elif self.__hour == 60:%0A            self.__hour = 0%0A
